Background
ESRS E1 paragraphs 35 to 37 state:
‘35. The undertaking shall provide information on its energy consumption and mix.
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 120 of 278
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
36. The objective of this Disclosure Requirement is to provide an understanding of the
undertaking’s total energy consumption in absolute value, improvement in energy efficiency,
